title: Drawing, "Study for Venus beside the sleeping Adonis", ca. 1700
inscribed: Reverse, written with ink, by a different hand, of the 18th century: Bolog; Paoli Sci; Pasqualino Marini
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: The nude goddess kneels behind and gazes at a young man lying on the couch with his head at left. Spear and horn are lying in the foreground. A tree is shown at left. Attributed to Pasquale Marini.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Study for Venus beside the sleeping Adonis", ca. 1700.Red crayon, paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-10.
